definition: Um endereço IP que designa um grupo de interfaces

Identificar unicamente uma interface de 
rede.
Version (4 bits), Traffic Class (8 bits), Flow Label (20 bits), Payload Length (16 bits), Next Header (8 bits), Hop Limit (8 bits), Source Address (128 bits), Destination Address (128 bits)
Identificar fluxos de pacotes que requerem tratamento especial IPv6

Version (4 bits), IHL (4 bits), Type of Service (8 bits), Total Length (16 bits), Identification (16 bits), Flags (3 bits), Fragment Offset (13 bits), Time to Live (8 bits), Protocol (8 bits), Header Checksum (16 bits), Source Address (32 bits), Destination Address (32 bits), Options (variável), Padding (variável)
